verbs.description: [ARG0: supporters of prop 6 gas tax repeal] [V: complain] [ARG1: ballot measure description is unfair] the backers of proposition 6 say the state official description of the ballot measure is unfair because it should at least mention something about a gas tax repeal senator scott wiener mark baldassarre official scott wiener san francisco repeal
